description: An AI Platform Engineer is a multi-agent system designed to manage operations across various tools such as ArgoCD, Jira, GitHub, PagerDuty, and Slack. Each tool has its own agent that handles specific tasks related to that tool.
name: AI Platform Engineer

skills.description: An AI Platform Engineer is a multi-agent system designed to manage operations across various tools such as ArgoCD, Jira, GitHub, PagerDuty, and Slack. Each tool has its own agent that handles specific tasks related to that tool.
examples: Create a new ArgoCD application named 'my-app'.
Get the status of the 'frontend' ArgoCD application.
Update the image version for 'backend' app.
skills.name: AI Platform Engineer
